mapper.select: /* 상위 메뉴 */ SELECT menu.menu_id , menu.hr_menu_id , menu.menu_nm , menu.page_url , menu.icon_val , auth.read_auth_yn AS auth_yn , auth.cret_auth_yn , auth.read_auth_yn , auth.upd_auth_yn , auth.del_auth_yn , auth.expt_auth_yn , auth.priv_data_read_auth_yn FROM practice.sys_menu_info menu INNER JOIN practice.sys_mgr_auth auth ON menu.menu_id = auth.menu_id WHERE menu.use_yn = 'Y' AND (hr_menu_id IS NULL OR hr_menu_id = '') AND auth.mgr_grp_id = #{mgrGrpId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND auth.read_auth_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY menu.ord_by_cls

/* 하위 메뉴 */ SELECT menu.menu_id , menu.hr_menu_id , menu.menu_nm , menu.page_url , menu.icon_val , auth.read_auth_yn AS auth_yn , auth.cret_auth_yn , auth.read_auth_yn , auth.upd_auth_yn , auth.del_auth_yn , auth.expt_auth_yn , auth.priv_data_read_auth_yn FROM practice.sys_menu_info menu INNER JOIN practice.sys_mgr_auth auth ON menu.menu_id = auth.menu_id WHERE menu.use_yn = 'Y' AND menu.hr_menu_id = #{menuId , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND auth.mgr_grp_id = #{mgrGrpId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY menu.ord_by_cls
